vote.title: Authorize an actual reasonable moving and related expense, nonresidential payment for Jerry Armstrong, Jr., who was displaced as a direct result of property acquisition of approximately 5.383 acres of land located at Botham Jean Boulevard and South Central Expressway for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $145,000.00 - Financing: Trinity River Corridor Project Fund
